summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 4.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 334 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles), cloud levels (up 543 m), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 333.7m lower than yesterday, 542.7m lower than past week, 463.8m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 292m to a maximum of 1476m, averaging 429.3m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 972.0m and 893.1m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and winds should remain light. Possible light showers, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and it’s dark. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
